details.about: Tintin is the fictional hero of The Adventures of Tintin, the comics series by Belgian cartoonist Hergé. He is a reporter and adventurer who travels around the world with his dog Snowy.
Captain Haddock is a fictional character in The Adventures of Tintin, the comics series by Belgian cartoonist Hergé. He is Tintin's best friend, a seafaring pipe-smoking Merchant Marine Captain.
Professor Calculus (French: Professeur Tournesol) is a fictional character in The Adventures of Tintin, the comics series by Belgian cartoonist Hergé.
